title: Interpretation of a dream about cooked lamb according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing pregnancy in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man eating lamb, eating lamb, cutting raw or cooked meat with rice, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq and. The dream of eating cooked lamb is one of the most delicious dishes in the Arab world, which is preferred by many and is always found on the tables of huge parties, events and celebrations such as Eid al-Adha. Interpretation of the sheep in a dream: Have mercy on the sheep if it is roasted and grilled and goes home. His dreams indicate that he is in contact with someone he does not know, and he is working as a guest for someone he does not know, or he is benefiting from his brothers who please them. And if he sees skinned sheep that are not tightened, then he is in luck. It is said: If lamb meat is cooked, it means money for labor, as in fire. It is said: Skin harms all people and causes sadness in a person’s home, because rams are similar to people and meat is not eaten. There are different interpretations of the dream of eating lamb according to leading scholars, and this article presents to you Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing cooked lamb in a dream. Interpretation of cooked lamb in a dream, according to the opinion of the scholar Ibn Sirin Sirin, the dream of a lamb or lamb in the dreamer’s house, skinned and roasted, is evidence that the dreamer will deal with strangers he does not know and host them in his house and reap a great benefit from that. They are. As for dreaming of cooked lamb in a dream and it was lean, it indicates that the dreamer communicates with people and hosts them in his home, but does not benefit from them. If one sees in a dream a lamb with the skin removed and uncooked, this indicates a disaster that the dreamer is going through. As for seeing lamb meat Precious in a dream, it is evidence that the dreamer will receive an inheritance from one of his relatives. To dream of cooking lamb over a fire means that the dreamer’s money will be spent on illness or entertainment. If the cooked lamb is immature in the dream, this indicates differences and disputes to which the dreamer is exposed. Dreaming of cooked lamb in a dream is evidence of nourishment and the appearance of goodness for the pioneer in general. A dream of cooked lamb may indicate the fulfillment of wishes and desires for the pioneer, but after a lot of effort and fatigue. A dream about eating lamb indicates illness, disaster, or sometimes even death. A girl dreams of being invited to a A table and she saw cooked lamb meat, and she ate from it and it tasted delicious, so the dream of cooked lamb here is news to her that kindness will come and she will get a living. A dream of pregnancy in an unmarried girl’s dream can also indicate the fulfillment of dreams and desires that the dreamer wants. But if a girl dreams She is cooking lamb in a dream, it is good for her to start a new life full of happiness with her husband. The dream of cooking lamb in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates marriage and the ability to bear responsibility and start a small family for which she will prepare her food. If an unmarried girl sees cooked meat In a dream, it means that she will obtain her livelihood without much effort or trouble. Seeing cooked lamb in a dream for a married woman, if it is delicious meat, means sustenance with a lot of money, and it may come from inheritance or work. If she sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love has many meanings and connotations, and although death is an undeniable fact, just mentioning it causes a lot of feelings of sadness in the soul, especially if it is related to a person who occupies a great place in the dreamer's heart. In the following lines, we will present its interpretation to jurists. Interpretation of a dream about the death of someone you love The dream of the death of a loved one carries many different interpretations, some good and some bad. It can indicate the relief that the dreamer will get after distress and reassurance after confusion, while if the deceased is his friend, this is a sign of his end to all the problems that burden him and occupy his mind, and it also symbolizes the long absence from each other due to marriage or long trips. Dreaming of the death of a loved one indicates the good news that this person receives, which will give him a lot of happiness. Illness, as well as evidence of the love and affection he has for this person. Interpretation of the dream of the death of a loved one by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin’s dream of the death of a loved one expresses the long life that this dead person actually enjoys on earth, and God knows best, and his death without any manifestation of sadness can indicate what the dreamer will gain from blessings. And many blessings in the coming days. It includes a dream about the death of a loved one in Ibn Sirin if it is accompanied by a sign of the sorrows and stumbling blocks that this person will go through in the coming period, which are countless. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one for a single person A dream about the death of a loved one for an unmarried woman, if she is a member of her family, indicates the love and wonderful feelings she has for him. Losing a mother in her dream symbolizes the care and attention she gives to her and the dreamer's kindness to her. It includes a dream about the death of someone you love for someone, if what you lose is someone who has already died, this is an indication of what you feel of longing and yearning for him. And this deceased suffers from financial distress, this is evidence of the end of all the material crises he is going through and the gifts that have filled his life. What is the interpretation of a dream about the death of a person and crying for a single person? The death of a loved one and crying for an unmarried person expresses what this dead person enjoys of a long life in reality, and also indicates the good qualities and high morals of this girl, which affects her positively and makes her respected, respected and respected. She is admired by everyone who deals with her, and it also indicates the end of all the bad things she has been through, the worries and sorrows she has felt, and the covers she has received. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a lover for a single woman The death of a lover indicates to a single woman in the event of her engagement the challenges that stand in the way of their love and soon end. We live a happy and stable life together. The death of a loved one, if the death is due to a scorpion bite, indicates the enemies surrounding this visionary, but if it is a wolf, this is a sign of the bitter days to come. While if the death is due to a snake, this is an indication of the betrayal he received from one of his close women and the associated feeling of sadness and sorrow. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a loved one for a married woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about palm trees

preview.html: Palm trees are characterized by their very high height, and seeing palm trees in a dream is a very beautiful dream that gives a feeling of comfort and calm. You may also be interested in knowing about the betrayal of a husband and lover in a dream, different meanings and connotations, and in this article we will talk about the pros and cons of Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing palm trees. In a dream. Dreaming of palm trees in a dream is interpreted for a man as evidence that he is a good friend to those around him. Also seeing palm trees in a dream is a sign of victory for the dreamer in his vision and his victory over enemies. If the bees are fruitful, this indicates that his coming offspring will be good and that his wife will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of the vision The best palm trees in a dream by Ibn Sirin Dreaming of palm trees in a dream carries many important positive things that we will explain to you in the following lines: The interpreter scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin pointed out that the palm tree in a dream shows a person who loves goodness for everyone and extends a helping hand and assistance at all times, and God knows best. It symbolizes The phoenix in the dreamer’s dream indicates his ability to overcome all the obstacles and difficulties he faces, as well as his strength, determination, and strong will that allow him to achieve all the goals he plans. Also, one of the meanings of seeing palm trees in a dream is that the dreamer will obtain a lot of and abundant money, and God knows best. Seeing a tall palm tree in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of a woman with an upright personality who knows her Lord well and supports her husband in all matters of the world. Seeing a fruitful palm tree in his dream means good and happy news that will change his life to a better state than it is now, and God knows best. Seeing a palm tree in a dream It indicates a good saying. The palm tree in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes victory over opponents and their crushing defeat, and God knows best. If the dreamer is afflicted with an illness and sees a palm tree in his dream, this indicates his complete recovery from all diseases and illnesses that continued to afflict him in his life. Among the indications that the palm tree symbolizes... The dreamer dreams that he will be blessed with good children who will be good with their families and relatives. The dreamer’s vision of tall, fruitful date trees indicates that he enjoys good health, and God knows best. Planting palm trees in the dreamer’s dream is one of the beautiful dreams that indicates happiness and joy in his life, in addition to reaping profits and benefits in the future. His future life. A single palm tree in the dreamer’s dream indicates his marriage and his possession of various information and knowledge, and God knows best. You may also be interested in knowing: The river in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the evil of palm trees in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The palm tree also carries beautiful and positive interpretations and meanings in the dreamer’s dream. It also has unwanted meanings and connotations, and we will explain it to you in the following lines as follows: The dreamer who sees a short palm tree in his sleep is a sign of a woman who does not give birth. It also indicates the many problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life, and God knows best. The dreamer’s vision of a fall Palm trees are disturbing dreams, indicating the collapse of the state with all its components. It also indicates failure to achieve goals, poverty, illness and death. Seeing fruitless date trees in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing chocolate in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Chocolate in real life is most people's favorite dessert. This is because it has a sweet and distinct taste, and it also has different shapes and colors, and thus it gives a different taste.. This also happens in the world of dreams. This is one of the factors on which the interpretation of a dream depends. Therefore, we will talk about the different interpretations that the dream brings in the following lines: The interpretation of chocolate in a dream usually heralds goodness, and seeing it in a dream brings happiness to the dreamer, and is a sign that good things will happen to him. Seeing white chocolate or dark color may indicate that it brings blessings and changes circumstances for the better.. It is A sign of joy and joy...and a sign for the monarch to get rid of things that burden his thinking, such as sadness and worry. Chocolate in a dream: It indicates a lot of money and food that will come to the dreamer without any effort or trouble. The interpretation of chocolate in a dream also indicates establishing relationships with new friends. Maybe these friends will help and support him. Or it may indicate that the dreamer will meet his life partner and they will agree to that. Perhaps seeing chocolate in a dream can be a sign for the dreamer to hear happy news or to wait for a happy event that will happen in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate according to its taste. I can give seeing chocolate in a dream. Interpretations vary according to its taste. We will explain this through the following: If the fortuneteller dreams of eating chocolate that has a sour or sour taste...this indicates bad news that will put him in a bad psychological state...and this news may be the death of someone close to him, which may lead to depression. The dream may indicate To the dreamer's lack of success and failure in many aspects of his life, such as the emotional, career, or academic aspect. The vision shows that the dreamer is anxious and hesitant about his future... due to the emergence of a serious crisis in his life that exhausts his thinking and makes him think about it day and night to find a way out. But if it is chocolate Its taste is bitter in a dream. It means success, success, and superiority over those around him. But the dreamer must be careful because there will be a reward, which is patience and hard work, so that he can achieve his goals after years of searching for the right path that allows him to achieve his goals in life. Chocolate with different flavors. In a dream: When we talk about the interpretation of chocolate in a dream, we point out that the dreamer tasting chocolate mixed with different flavors in a dream can indicate many different interpretations, which we recognize as follows: The dreamer tasting chocolate with fruit in a dream indicates wealth and material sufficiency. If the dreamer sees chocolate with hazelnuts Or almonds in a dream. If he is a businessman or a merchant in real life, this will be a sign for him of a significant increase in earnings and profits. But if the dreamer sees that someone is already sick, eating chocolate with almonds or...hazelnuts in a dream, this indicates that this The patient will recover soon, God willing. Chocolate filled with dates in a dream is a sign for the dreamer

title: Interpretation of a kiss in a dream for a single woman, the meaning of a dream about a kiss in good and evil

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you through the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of a Kiss in a Dream for Single People. It is one of the visions that once you see it in a dream, you often want to know its interpretation. Like a kiss in real life, far from the world of dreams, it is clear evidence of friendship and love between people, and there is no condition that says it is only between lovers. But it can be exchanged between parents, relatives, children, parents...etc. If it is a sign of kindness and good relations between people, it also indicates feelings of care, appreciation, and tenderness, but it is known that what happens in reality is different from the situation that one sees in a dream, and therefore the dream. Interpretation scholars have put together all the interpretations related to seeing the kiss in a dream, which we will mention in light of the interpretation of seeing an unmarried woman in a dream. Interpretation of the kiss in a dream for a single woman. Below we mention the interpretation of the kiss in a single woman’s dream, as narrated by Imam Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin believes that the unmarried woman who... Seeing a kiss in a dream expresses her need for attention, appreciation, and love from those around her. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, two people or a group of people kissing, means that she is characterized by curiosity that prompts her to interfere in the lives of others and her desire to see the details of their lives, which is behavior that no one has touched upon. With God and people. The kiss, which is not followed by lust, symbolizes meeting one’s needs, ease of dealing, and ease of approaching God. The kiss between an unmarried woman and one of her brothers, as if she saw her kissing her sister or brother, shows the extent of her interest in the womb relationship and the happiness and emotional stability that she lives with Her family. Kissing one person on the hand of someone symbolizes the appreciation and gratitude she feels towards that person and this dream is often reflected in kissing the hand of one of the parents. An unmarried woman seeing an animal in a dream symbolizes her relationship with an evil and corrupt person who wants to harm her and whose intention is far from Good, and she should be careful and think carefully before consummating the marriage with her, and God knows best. Seeing kisses on the forehead from one person to another symbolizes your feeling of guilt towards a person you wronged, but you cannot satisfy this feeling or get rid of it. The interpretation of one kiss with a familiar person in a dream is different. The interpretation of kissing in The dream is whether it is between an individual and a person he knows, and then the form of the relationship plays a role in the interpretation, and whether it is an unknown person, and we will explain below: its interpretation points for seeing a familiar person receiving an unmarried woman in a dream: The kiss in the dream, if it is between a person and a person he knew in the dream , as if it were a mother, a friend, or other people, symbolizing how strong the bond unites her with her. A person who is one of the most important and closest people in her heart and mind. Seeing an unmarried woman kissing a friend or relative she knows and she was not satisfied with the kiss and felt uncomfortable, this indicates that the relationship between them is in a state of tension, as this friend or relative can convey to the viewer feelings of hatred And hatred, or these feelings are in the heart of the viewer towards the one she kissed in the dream. Seeing an unmarried woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mobile phone in a dream - seeing a phone in a dream or a mobile phone

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a mobile phone in a dream - to see a phone in a dream or interpretation of a mobile phone to see a mobile phone in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a phone and seeing a phone in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. You can see: Seeing a flood in a dream - a symbol of the appearance of a flood in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a phone Mobile phone in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees in a dream that he is calling someone, but the call is disconnected, this is bad and unpleasant evidence for the fortuneteller. And whoever sees that he is calling someone, but there is confusion in the call, this indicates the tension and anxiety that accompanies the viewer and perhaps confusion in making a decision. In his personal or professional life. Anyone who sees that the service has been cut off from his mobile phone, this is bad evidence. And whoever sees that his phone is broken, this indicates that he is suffering from problems, and these problems can be physical, psychological, or family. And whoever sees that his phone has exploded, this indicates that he is suffering from problems, and these problems can be physical, psychological, or family. It indicates the emergence of a violent dispute that leads to calamity and misery. And whoever sees that his phone has been burned, this indicates adultery and entering into a forbidden relationship. Interpretation of seeing a cell phone or a cell phone in a dream for a man. Seeing a man in his dream that he is buying a new cell phone or a cell phone indicates new possibilities. Pleasant revolutions will occur in his life and portend the arrival of happiness for him and his family. A man’s vision of buying a black phone indicates that he will leave the races and fight with victory and strength. Seeing a man in a dream that he is buying a red or red phone means joy, love, affection, and good news. And he bought a bright red phone for a young man. A single man shows a woman that he will marry her. Especially since buying a phone means money by paying a dowry, and red shows love, and a love relationship with a dowry is marriage. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone or mobile phone in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a cell phone or cell phone for an unmarried girl in a dream indicates good news, as We mentioned that women and girls are in good health and it likely means marriage or engagement. If an unmarried girl sees that she is talking on her phone and receives a call, this means that she will meet a man and marry him soon. If an unmarried girl sees that she is communicating with a man, this indicates that she will marry this man. A man, but this indicates that this is not the case and she will make a lot of effort in her life. Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone or mobile phone in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s vision of a carrier or mobile phone indicates things worthy of praise, even if she bought a phone with good features in her dream. And this It indicates that a male will be born, and with his coming all the doors of good and wide sustenance will be open. If a pregnant woman sees that she hears an annoying phone ringing sound during her sleep, this indicates bad news that is disturbing her and she hopes it will not happen. If the ringing sound is pleasant, this is a sign that she heard news that pleased her. It interprets her breasts.Interpretation of seeing a mobile phone or mobile phone in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman on a mobile phone in a dream indicates that pregnancy is approaching and that she will give birth to offspring that please the eye. A married woman seeing a mobile phone

title: I dreamed that I killed a snake, looking for an explanation

preview.html: I dreamed that I killed a snake: I dreamed that I killed a snake. We all know for sure that the snake is one of the most dangerous types of animals in the world and it is known that humans hate snakes because they do not feel safe with the snake at all. If a snake bites a person, the person will die immediately. Therefore, we will present on the site a different article about: I dreamed that I killed a snake, and what is its interpretation? It is said that seeing a snake killed in a dream means getting rid of trouble, staying away from bad friends and escaping from crises. To the last thing that worries a person, seeing a snake in a dream and killing it. Many meanings, we will give you all the possible interpretations that we learn through today’s article. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and killing it in a dream for a single girl: When a girl dreams that she sees a snake trying to bite her and hits her and kills it immediately, the dream indicates that she will get rid of a big problem in her life that will cause her A big crisis, God Almighty. High and knowledgeable. But if the unmarried girl sees that she sees the snake and she is honest with him and is not afraid of him, then the dream indicates that she knows a bad person and will cause him trouble and will try to harm and deceive her, and he tells her that in love he must stay away from him immediately, because God Almighty The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and killing it in a dream for a married woman: But if a married woman said that she dreamed that I killed a snake and the color of that snake was black, then the dream indicates that a malicious person is entering her house and wants to have problems in her life, and if she kills that snake The dream indicates that she will get rid of all the problems and people who are her enemies in life forever, and God knows best. But if the married woman says that she dreamed that I killed a snake, then she is trying to keep her husband away from some problems and save her husband from the snake and kill him, and the dream shows that she will help her husband in Obtained. Getting rid of some of life’s problems that may have a significant impact, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a snake and killing it in a dream for a divorced woman: As for the divorced woman, and if she saw a snake in her dream, she will kill it, and the dream indicates that she will be freed from a major crisis in her life, and that God will relieve her of the worry and anxiety that will occur. It was revealed in her life, and God Almighty knows best. But if a divorced woman sees that she dreamed that I killed a snake, and in fact I killed it permanently, then the dream indicates that God relieves her of her worries, gives her a lot of goodness and food, and also accepts a happy stage in her. . Life and God are Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a snake and killing it in a dream for a man: But if a person sees in a dream that he saw a snake and struck it and then got up, then the dream shows that person’s victory over the enemies and that he gets rid of the crises in his life with ease and grace from God. God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But if someone sees in a dream and says, “I dreamed that I killed a black snake,” then the dream indicates getting rid of a big problem in his life and that God will save him from falling into it, and he may suffer a lot from this harm, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a snake And killed him in

title: Oranges in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating oranges in a dream, and they taste delicious and very beautiful in the dream. It shows that she will get rid of the difficult things that she was going through in her life during this period. It is also a sign of the good things that she will experience and continue At this time, the unmarried girl who tried to find oranges in a dream and was very sad in the dream. This indicates that he will fall into some bad things that will cause him great pain. It also indicates the intense anxiety that is occupying her mind, and making her feel uncomfortable at this time. An unmarried girl who sees that she is taking a lot of oranges and storing them in a dream. The meaning indicates that she will try to preserve the privacy and importance of things in her life. It also differs that she keeps a person or people close to her in life and that she is happy. See also: Orange juice in a dream. Interpretation of a vision. Oranges in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream sees many oranges in her house and she is happy. It indicates stability in her life and she is characterized by wisdom in thinking about difficult matters in her life. It also indicates the peaceful life that she is currently living with her husband, God willing. But the interpretation differs in seeing Rotten oranges if a married woman eats them. This is a sign that she is doing something wrong in her life, and it is making her very sad. It also explains the hardships that she will face in her life and will not end them. Seeing a married woman in a dream means that she gets a lot of oranges in the dream. This is an indication of positive In her life, she will get rid of the negatives that she lives with. It also indicates the abundance of money and luxury that this married woman is experiencing at this time. Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman’s vision was taking oranges from a stranger in a dream while she saw him. This indicates that it will happen. He is deeply in love with her in the near future and will end up getting married, God willing. It also shows her success in life at this time and her overcoming difficulties in all her affairs. The divorced woman who dreams of oranges and longs for their taste and eats from them. This indicates her desire to succeed in her life and that she is currently making an effort. In this regard. The dream also shows the good things in her life that she will see and live, God willing. The divorced woman looks at an orange in a dream and tries to buy it in the dream. Here, it appears that there are major problems that she is going through now and occupying her mind. It also explains that she is going through some crises in her life, which increases It greatly saddened her. Read also: Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing oranges in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating an orange in a dream, and he is very happy with its delicious taste. Here it indicates goodness and improvement of his conditions in the coming periods, God willing. As It indicates that he has gotten rid of the troubles and problems that he is going through in his life, and God knows best. And if he buys large quantities of oranges in a dream and is happy with that, then he declares that he has achieved many of the goals that he sought.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream or a dream via the website Roy2a.com, Surat Al-Balad is a Meccan surah of 20 verses and is in Part 30. It was revealed after Surat Q and its order in the Qur’an is No. 90. The Surah speaks about man’s deception of his ability while mentioning his greatness and the ability of the Almighty Creator by mentioning Sermons and guidance. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream. This is what we will talk about today with an explanation of the most important interpretations provided by major dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of Surat Al-Balad in a dream. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s feeling of security after a state of fear and panic. Looking at this Surat Al-Balad shows that the dreamer will be granted success from God Almighty to do good and righteous people. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream indicates repentance from false statements or allegations made by the monarch. Crossing Surat Al-Balad in a dream is for mercy, charity, and kindness to orphans and the needy. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ala in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says that seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream is an indication that the fortuneteller has changed for the better. Surat Al-Balad in a dream. Safety over fear, redress, and happiness for those who suffer. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream is an indication of a false statement that came out of the dreamer and he regretted it. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream indicates that it is to feed the orphans and the needy, and that the dreamer will be characterized by mercy and tenderness. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Isra in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream for a single woman. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news for her about her approaching marriage to a young man. Adel. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream indicates that a girl will be relieved of her worries and sadness and soon her condition will change for the better. Surat Al-Balad in a dream about a girl is a sign of good news that she will hear and rejoice in her future. Seeing Surat Al-Balad written in the sky in a girl’s dream is a sign of achieving the security that she was desperately trying to achieve. He had wanted to achieve it for a while. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Jinn in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream for a married woman. Reading Surat Al-Balad in a dream for a married woman is an indication that she enjoys a stable and happy life with her husband and family. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream indicates for a married woman news of her pregnancy. Soon. Seeing a married woman buying the Qur’an in a dream is an indication of food and tremendous goodness for her and her husband in his work or trade. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream for a pregnant woman is an indication of the approaching date of her birth. Surah Al-Balad in a dream about a pregnant woman is an indication of ease of pregnancy and childbirth. Surat Al-Balad expresses the dream of a pregnant woman for the state of fear and anxiety that a pregnant woman experiences during her pregnancy. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Takwir in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Balad in a dream for a man. Seeing Surat Al-Balad for a man in a dream is an indication of getting rid of the problems and obstacles he faces in his life and replacing them with stable circumstances. Recitation of Surat Al-Balad. Country
